entry.lex: The 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument stands in Gettysburg, in Adams County, Pennsylvania. The American monument, built in 2000 is classed as a Contributing Property.
The 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument was established in 2000, and is considered a Contributing Property. It is located in the municipality of Gettysburg, in Adams County, Pennsylvania, USA.

The 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument is in Adams County, Gettysburg municipality, Pennsylvania in the United States. The Monument is categorized as a Contributing Property and was established in 2000.
